010.title: 010 Title
010.helpText: Spell out any acronyms and limit to 144 characters.
010.label: Title

programNumber.title: Program Number
programNumber.helpText: Provide a unique three digit program number (for example, enter “244” for CFDA number 10.244).
programNumber.label: Number

040.title: 040 Authorization
040.helpText: You must add at least one authorization.
040.label: Authorization

050.title: 050 Objectives
050.helpText: Provide a plain text description highlighting program goals. Use specific terms that will help public users find this listing.
050.label: Objectives

060.title: 060 Types of Assistance
060.helpText: Select all that clearly reflect the services provided.
060.label: Types of Assistance

070.title: 070 Uses and Use Restrictions
070.helpText: Describe how assistance may be used. Use specific terms that will help public users find this listing.
070.label: Uses and Use Restrictions

restrictions.label: Are there specific restrictions place upon the use of the assistance?
restrictions.helpText: List any restrictions on how assistance may be used. Only provide restrictions specific to your organization or this listing.

loanTerms.label: Are loans a type of assistance in this program?

form.intro: Select at least one program from list.

170.title: 170 Examples of Funded Projects
170.label: Are there examples of funded projects?

projects.label: Provide five or more examples that show how funding might be used.  Describe the subject area without identifying program details.

190.title: 190 Functional Codes
190.helpText: Select one or more Functional Codes to help public users search for this listing.
190.label: Functional Codes

300.title: 300 Subject Terms
300.helpText: Select one or more Subject Terms to help public users search for this listing.
300.label: Subject Terms

eligibleApplicants.label: Eligible Applicants
eligibleApplicants.helpText: Select all that apply to help public users search for this listing.

useOfAssistance.label: Use Of Assistance
useOfAssistance.helpText: Select all that apply to help public users search for this listing.

additionalInfo.helpText: Describe who may apply for the assistance.
additionalInfo.label: Additional Information

beneficiaryEligibility.label: Beneficiary Eligibility
beneficiaryEligibility.helpText: Select all that apply to help public users search for this listing.

additionalInfo.helpText: Describe who may benefit from the assistance.
additionalInfo.label: Additional Information
What qualifications must be demonstrated? Only consider credentials or documentation specific to your organization or this listing.

costPrincipalsAcceptable.label: Is 2 CFR 200, Subpart E - Cost Principles applicable?

091.title: 091 Pre-application Coordination
091.label: Is any prior coordination or approval required with governmental or nongovernmental units prior to the submission of a formal application to the Federal funding agency?

environmentalImpact.label: Does this program require submission of environmental impact information?

preappCoord3question2.label: Does Executive Order 12372, "Intergovernmental Review of Federal Program", apply to this program?

additionalInfo.label: Describe other coordination requirements if applicable.

092.title: 092 Application Procedures
092.label: Does 2 CFR 200, Uniform Administrative Requirements, Cost Principles, and Audit Requirements for Federal Awards apply to this program?

additionalInfo.helpText: List all steps in the application process.
additionalInfo.label: Other Application Procedures:

093.title: 093 Award Procedure
093.label: Describe how assistance is awarded.  Include who approves the award and how assistance is distributed.

094.title: 094 Deadlines
094.label: Is a deadline for submission of application available?

deadlines.title: Current Deadlines
deadlines.helpText: List all deadlines in the application process.  Enter each deadline separately.

form.intro: Use the calendar and/or description field to provide deadline date(s). Leave the End Date blank if the deadline is fixed.

dateRange.label: Select the range that best represents how much time the approval process takes.

additionalInfo.helpText: Provide an additional information if appropriate.
additionalInfo.label: Other Approval Information:

dateRange.label: Select the range that best represents how long an applicant has to appeal a decision.

additionalInfo.helpText: Describe appeal, rework, or other options for applications that are not approved.
additionalInfo.label: Other Appeals Information:

dateRange.label: Select the range that best represents when an awardee may apply for a renewal or extension.

101.title: 101 Formula and Matching Requirements
101.helpText: See the reference guide or online help for instructions when Yes is selected.

statuatoryFormula.label: Does this program have a statutory formula and/or administrative rule reference in the CFR?

matchingRequirements.label: Does this program have matching requirements?

moeRequirements.label: Does this program have MOE requirements AND total allocations over $100 million (current FY)?

additionalInfo.label: Please enter any additional information below:

102.title: 102 Length and Time Phasing of Assistance

assistLimit.label: Describe the period of time when assistance is available. Also, the period of time when funding must be spent.

assistanceAwarded.helpText: Select the value that best represents how funding is released.
assistanceAwarded.label: How is the assistance awarded and/or released?

180.title: 180 Criteria for Selecting Proposals
180.label: Is there criteria for selecting proposals?

additionalInfo.helpText: List all factors used to select awardees. Include how these factors are prioritized or weighted.
additionalInfo.label: Please describe criteria for selecting proposals:

111.title: 111 Reports
111.label: Are reports required by the funding agency?

additionalInfo.label: Describe progress, performance, cash, expenditure or other required reports for this listing.

112.title: 112 Audits
112.label: Are audits required for the program?

auditRequirements.label: Does 2 CFR 200, Subpart F - Audit Requirements apply to this program?

additionalInfo.helpText: Describe audit procedures for this program. Only include requirements not already covered by 2 CFR 200.
additionalInfo.label: What audit procedures have been mandated for the program?

113.title: 113 Records
113.label: Describe required records. Include the time period when the records must be kept.

140.title: 140 Regulations, Guidelines, and Literature
140.label: Are there any regulations, guidelines or literature?

additionalInfo.label: List references to all official published information related to this listing. Omit references to 2 CFR 200.

121.title: 121 Account Identification
121.label: List the 11-digit budget account identification code(s) that funds the program. This code must match the President’s budget.

122.title: 122 Obligations
122.label: Financial information must be consistent with the President’s budget. Enter obligations for each type of assistance separately.

recovery.label: Is this a Recovery and Reinvestment Act Obligation?

salaryOrExpense.label: Is this for Federal salaries and expenses?

assistanceType.label: Select the type of assistance that best represents how this funding is obligated.

form.helpText: Enter a dollar amount (format xx,xxx,xxx).  Exclude the dollar sign.

123.title: 123 Range and Average of Financial Assistance
123.label: Provide a range that best represents the smallest and largest awards available. Provide an approximate average award size.

124.title: 124 TAFS Codes - Unique Treasury Appropriation Fund Symbols
124.label: Enter as many components as possible. Treasury Dept Code, Allocation Transfer Agency, and Treasury Account Main Code are required.

130.title: 130 Program Accomplishments
130.label: Are there program accomplishments?
130.helpText: Showcase for public users the achievements associated with this listing.  Use clear, plain language and provide compelling examples.

additionalInfo.helpText: Identify Federal regional or local offices that may be contacted about this listing.
additionalInfo.label: Additional Information:

152.title: 152 Headquarters Office
152.label: Identify at least one point of contact who has operational responsibility for this listing. Additional contacts may be added.

153.title: 153 Website
153.label: Provide the primary web page URL for this listing. When possible, the web page should be specific to this listing.
